Subject: IGL Regular - Mic Case VS Hugar

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107

The small arena that the two combatants are in is dome shaped with no obvious 
exits except for the stadium-style seats the diverse alien spectators sit and 
prepare to watch the match.  The combatants could easily attempt to leave if 
they wanted.

Over the loudspeaker of this small arena, the official begins.  "This match 
between Mic Case and Hugar is non-lethal.  The loser will be whoever yields 
first.  Begin the battle!"
